BriefDescription.desc: The management and ownership of al Amer mall belongs to Abdullah Ali al Amer & Brothers Company.

Al Amer mall was designed to become the name in which the names of fashion and retail activities come together in Al Ahsa, this is when we talk about seasonal shopping, but on the life side, Al Amer mall has found to become a permanent hiking destination for the people of Al Ahsa and its visitors and a daily stopover on their way home to announce a new concept for shopping and entertainment centers.

Each corner of the "Al Amer mall "was designed to be a new exceptional interface for inspiration, enjoyment, shopping, interaction and comfort, with a modern design according to the best international specifications, the total building area is 66 thousand square meters, while the rental area is 32 thousand square meters, and the mall consists of six floors that includes the entertainment area with an area of more than 3,800 square meters and the Hypermarket Al Amer with an area of about 8,500 square meters, in addition to the restaurant Square and a parking floor with a capacity of 400 cars, in addition to the interior spaces open and external Sessions

Al Amer mall is designed in such a way that the sun's Rays spread their natural light in the wide internal corridors to give pleasure and comfort to our visitors, in addition to the suspended and dancing fountain with a height of about 23 meters, which is sweetened by sunlight passing through the glass ceilings, and the parking lot contains a ventilation system even in the hottest.

Al Amer mall will feature an unparalleled selection of international and local brands from clothing stores, jewelry, watches, furniture stores, home decoration, Electronics, Restaurants and cafes, health products, pharmacies, telecommunications service providers, in addition to the Al Amer hypermarket, which is known for its competitive prices
Let's create a unique experience that takes our visitors to experience new pleasant experiences in the world of shopping and entertainment
